title: Towa no Quon 3: Mugen no Renza

alternative_titles.ja: トワノクオン 第３章 夢幻の連座

synopsis:
While out on a mission, Attractor Tei Ryuumonji and WTOC cyborg Epsilon become psychically linked and trapped in a coma. As the rival Attractors and Custos factions try to wake their respective peers, Custos realizes that they may be able to trace the link and pinpoint their target's hideout. Desperately wanting to keep everyone safe, Quon Mitsuchi follows Tei into the mental realm in order to intervene from the inside. As Quon investigates the link, seemingly impossible truths about his past are revealed.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
